attributes.action: Have a referendum on withdrawing from the Barcelona and Marakesh declaration
attributes.background: When we were entered into these contracts we was never informed and also it wasn't the UK government or citizens that was given the option to consider the options of entering this agreement so I think that the British citizens should have the say in what our homeland are subjected to

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. The Barcelona and Marrakech Declarations are political agreements and are not legally binding. On leaving the EU the UK will no longer participate, unless the Withdrawal Agreement provides otherwise.
